dao.name: QRY_PSI_FORMAT_STA
dao.statement: select format_sta ,quote_rmk ,order_time from psi_quote_rf_mn where trim(comp_cod) = trim(:comp_cod) and (trim(cust_cod) = trim(:cust_cod) or cust_cod is null) and ((order_time = 'PXW1' and substr(:period_cod, 4, 2) = 'W1') or trim(order_time) = :week or order_time is null or (:period_cod = 'P01W1' and order_time = 'P1W1'))

dao.name: QRY_SEARCH_PSI_FORMAT_STA
dao.statement: select format_sta as value ,quote_rmk as display from psi_quote_rf_mn where trim(comp_cod) = trim(:comp_cod)

dao.name: QRY_ALL_PSI_FORMAT_STA
dao.statement: select format_sta, quote_rmk, order_time from psi_quote_rf_mn where trim(comp_cod) = trim(:comp_cod)

dao.name: QRY_GOODS_DATA
dao.statement: Select psi_quote_rf_dt.goods_cod, goods_mn.goods_rmk, (rtrim("UNIT_RF"."UNIT_TYP") || ':' || rtrim("UNIT_RF"."UNIT_NAM")) as goods_unit From goods_mn, PSI_QUOTE_RF_DT, unit_rf WHERE ( GOODS_MN.COMP_COD = PSI_QUOTE_RF_DT.COMP_COD ) and ( GOODS_MN.COMP_COD = unit_rf.COMP_COD ) and ( GOODS_MN.GOODS_COD = PSI_QUOTE_RF_DT.GOODS_COD ) and ( goods_mn.qunit_typ = unit_rf.unit_typ ) and ( PSI_QUOTE_RF_DT.COMP_COD = :comp_cod) AND ( PSI_QUOTE_RF_DT.FORMAT_STA = :format_sta)
